text: 170 (one hundred seventy) is a whole number. It comes after 169 and before 171. == In mathematics == *Even number: 170 is even because it can be divided by 2 with no remainder. *Factors: 170 = 2 × 5 × 17. *Sum of squares: 170 can be written as a sum of two squares in two different ways: 170=13^2+1^2 and 170=11^2+7^2 == In science == Chemistry: One of the isotopes of the element ytterbium has a mass number of 170 (called ytterbium-170). Category:Integers
title: 170 (number)
